Python question. What should I use for the following, pybind11? cython? something else? So, I am constructing an assignment for a programming course. What tool should I use for this: end result is to build a python module where there is a short c++ code with some callable functions inside.
1) I want to give the students a short c++-code with some functions defined. I want them in linux to use some easy tool to just create the necessary additional files and directories.
2) they should build the module
3) they should be able to install/import in python3
4) now they modify the c++ code for their purpose, install and run on their data

Assumption is minimal experience with linux.

Ease of use is higher priority than "real-world usefullness"
